title: Let's Talk Witches: Wanda Maximoff
itunes:title: Let's Talk Witches: Wanda Maximoff
description:
Marvel's Wanda Maximoff, AKA Scarlet Witch, historically represents many intersections - Romani, Jewish and a witch. Friend of the show Joey Patt joins us to examine these intersections, the history of them, and how they're being handled (or not) right now.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
